trans-unit.source: Provides data for an event that is raised by calling the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs> class is used in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A> method to enable subscribers to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> event to return an instance of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> class.

By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> event, you can create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> representation of a page without implementing a custom site map provider.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> objects.
Both the `context` and `provider` parameters might be `null`.
The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> object initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs> class with values that are not `null`.
An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> that represents the context of the current page request.
The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> that raised the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"></xref> event.
Gets the context of the page request that the requested node represents.

Event subscribers can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> objects to dynamically create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object and retrieve information about the requested page, such as the requested URL, as well as user information.
An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>, if one is specified; otherwise, `null`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> object that raised the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"></xref> event.

Event subscribers can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> objects to dynamically create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object and retrieve information about the requested page, such as the requested URL, as well as user information.
The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> that raised the event; otherwise, `null`, if no provider is specified during the `EventArgs` object construction.
